H0.text: In which Ayrshire village will you find the cottage birthplace of poet Robert Bums which is now a museum. Tarbolton

H1.text: In which Ayrshire village will you find the cottage birthplace of poet Robert Bums which is now a museum. Mauchline

H2.text: In which Ayrshire village will you find the cottage birthplace of poet Robert Bums which is now a museum. Catrine

H3.text: In which Ayrshire village will you find the cottage birthplace of poet Robert Bums which is now a museum. Alloway

A4.text: Burns Cottage, the birthplace of Robert Burns, is located in Alloway and is now adjacent to a museum.
